document_data.name: Welcoming Hand Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Welcoming Hand Inn''' was an [[inn]] located in the village of [[Eveningstar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The inn was located in along the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] on the western edge of the village.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Welcoming Hand Inn was a burned-out ruin in the late 1300s DR.
